alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Coweta; Heard (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 2:26PM EDT until August 06 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Carroll County in northwestern Georgia... Heard County in west central Georgia... Southwestern Coweta County in west central Georgia... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 226 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Centralhatchee, or near Franklin, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Franklin, Ephesus, Centralhatchee, Corinth, Frolona, Texas, Plant Wansley, Blackjack Mountain, Powers Crossroads, Roosterville, and Handy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
